org.dyn4j.dynamics

Interface DestructionListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Listener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DestructionAdapter

    public interface DestructionListener
extends Listener
    Listens for implicit destruction events.

    These events can happen when, for example, a Body is removed from a World where it was attached to a Joint. The joint must be removed as well. These methods will be called when any such implicit destruction events happen.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    3.1.1
    Author:
    William Bittle

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void destroyed(Body body)
      Called when implicit destruction of a Body has occurred.
      void destroyed(ContactPoint contactPoint)
      Called when implicit destruction of a ContactConstraint has occurred.
      void destroyed(Joint joint)
      Called when implicit destruction of a Joint has occurred.

    • Method Detail

      • destroyed

        void destroyed(Joint joint)
        Called when implicit destruction of a Joint has occurred.

        Modification of the World is permitted during this method.

        Parameters:
        joint - the Joint that was destroyed
        See Also:
        World.removeBody(Body), World.removeAllBodiesAndJoints(boolean)

      • destroyed

        void destroyed(ContactPoint contactPoint)
        Called when implicit destruction of a ContactConstraint has occurred.

        Modification of the World is not permitted during this method.

        Parameters:
        contactPoint - the ContactPoint that was destroyed
        See Also:
        World.removeBody(Body), World.removeAllBodiesAndJoints(boolean)

      • destroyed

        void destroyed(Body body)
        Called when implicit destruction of a Body has occurred.

        Modification of the World is not permitted during this method.

        Parameters:
        body - the Body that was destroyed
        Since:
        1.0.2
        See Also:
        World.removeAllBodiesAndJoints(boolean)
